name: elm-routing-sass-boilerplate
description: A folder structure to create an Elm app with routing working out of the box, as well as `.sass` and `.elm` files compilation **on save**, using a Bash script.

scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -f index.html dist/index.html && cp -f -r assets dist/assets && cp -f -r css dist/css && cp -f -r js/ dist/js && surge -p dist/
